dct_title_s: Plan of Governor's, Kennedy's and Brown's Island with Paulus and Red Hook together with part of the Bay and Soundings, shewing the position they bear to each other and to New York
dct_description_sm: Map shows Kennedy's (Bedlows), Notten (Governor's), and Brown's Island, as well as Paulus Hook, Red Hook, the Bay of New York, East River, and North River.
